name: Missing Stars: Act One
description:
After a certain incident that left him traumatized, Erik Wilhelm transfers in to Privatgymnasium St. Dymphna, a special Viennese school for young adults living with psychological disorders, where he meets a colorful cast of characters that will turn his formerly uneventful life upside down.

Features:

  • 25 hours of reading (Over 240,000 words!)
  • Six unique routes with fun, endearing characters
  • Over 650 original images
  • Almost two hours of original music
